Package org.dkr.graph.algo.community

Class WeaklyConnectedComponents<K,​VV,​EV>

java.lang.Object
org.dkr.graph.algo.community.WeaklyConnectedComponents<K,​VV,​EV>
Type Parameters:
K - ID type
VV - vertex value type
EV - edge value type
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.flink.graph.GraphAlgorithm<K,​VV,​EV,​org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<org.apache.flink.graph.Vertex<K,​VV>>>
public class WeaklyConnectedComponents<K,​VV,​EV> extends Object implements org.apache.flink.graph.GraphAlgorithm<K,​VV,​EV,​org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<org.apache.flink.graph.Vertex<K,​VV>>>
The class WeaklyConnectedComponents computes weakly connected components and converges when no vertex updates its component ID or when the maximum number of iterations has been reached.
